nodes.text: Area D-513 was an area of space in the Dantooine system. X10-700 "Destroyer" and other members of the Detritus Satellites—sentient Vulture droid scavengers—operated in this area.
This area is mentioned in a rare information storage deviced named "An Alliance Agreement" that can be looted from starfighters in the Dantooine system in Star Wars Galaxies
